entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Neo Monsters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • 13 GemsÔºö$7.99
  • 6 GemsÔºö$3.99
  • 1 GemÔºö$0.99
  • 48 GemsÔºö$28.99
  • 150 GemsÔºö$79.99
  • 74 GemsÔºö$40.99
  • 28 GemsÔºö$14.99

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? ‚ñ∂Features: ‚óè Build your Monster Collection ‚Ä¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! ‚Ä¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. ‚Ä¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! ‚óè Form a Battle Strategy ‚Ä¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. ‚Ä¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! ‚Ä¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. ‚óè Become the Champion ‚Ä¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! ‚Ä¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. ‚Ä¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle‚Äôs atrocity. ‚óè Take the Battle Online ‚Ä¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! ‚Ä¢ Complete 100+ online missions. ‚Ä¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions? Contact our support: neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net Terms of Service: https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://www.zigzagame.com/privacy-policy/

entry.title: OOTP Baseball 26 Go!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • OOTP26 Pack Booster BundleÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $49.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • OOTP26 Pack Booster BundleÔºö$14.99
  • 25,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$19.99
  • 175,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$99.99
  • 12,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$9.99
  • 75,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$49.99
  • 5,500 PP for OOTP Go 26!Ôºö$4.99

Application Description

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way ¬∑ Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. ¬∑ Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History ¬∑ Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 ¬∑ Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of ¬∑ Manage all on-field decisions and strategies ¬∑ Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses ¬∑ Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase ¬∑ Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team ¬∑ Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world ¬∑ Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users ¬∑ Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available ¬∑ Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year ¬∑ Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more ¬∑ 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation ¬∑ Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale ¬∑ KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation ¬∑ Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about ¬∑ Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. ¬∑ Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" ¬∑ And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product ‚Äì MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE¬Æ Out of the Park Developments ¬© Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay ¬∑ STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. ¬∑ MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM ¬∑ PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. ¬∑ CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. ‚Äª You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: ‚Ä¢ Language support: English, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥ ‚Ä¢ Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. ‚Ä¢ For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 ‚Ä¢ For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

entry.title: ProCam - Pro Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • AI SpatialÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.00 [$0.00 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • 4K Ultra HD VideoÔºö$4.99
  • The Master CollectionÔºö$1.99
  • ZERO: Direct Sensor CaptureÔºö$0.00
  • 4K Ultra HD Time LapseÔºö$2.99
  • The Urban CollectionÔºö$0.99
  • The Elemental CollectionÔºö$0.99
  • Batch Photo ActionsÔºö$0.00
  • AI SpatialÔºö$0.00
  • 8K Max Time LapseÔºö$4.99

Application Description

SHOOTING MODES - Photo - Burst Mode - Slow Shutter - Portrait Mode - supported on all dual lens camera system as well as iPhone XR and iPhone SE 2020 - 3D Photo - requires dual lens camera system - Video - Time Lapse PHOTO SHUTTER RELEASE OPTIONS - Self-Timer - Anti-Shake - Screen Shutter / Big Button - Interval VIDEO FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS - VGA, 720p, 1080p - 4K Ultra HD - 3264x1836 upscaled to 3840x2160 - in-app purchase - iPhone 5s / iPad Air 2 and later - 4K Ultra HD - 3840x2160 - native support on iPhone 6s / Plus and later - 4K Max - 4032x2268 - in-app purchase - iPhone 6s / Plus and later - High frame rate: * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 720p - iPhone 5 / iPad mini and later * 96 / 100 /120 fps 720p - iPhone 5s / iPad Air 2 and later * 192 / 200 / 240 fps 720p - iPhone 6 and later * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 1080p - iPhone 6 and later * 96 / 100 / 120 fps 1080p - iPhone 6s / Plus and later * 192 / 200 / 240 fps 1080p - iPhone 8 and later * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 8 and later TIME LAPSE FRAME RATES AND RESOLUTIONS - VGA, 720p, 1080p - 4K Ultra HD - 3264x1836 upscaled to 3840x2160 - in-app purchase - iPhone 5 / iPad Air 2 and later - 4K Ultra HD - 3840x2160 - native support on iPhone 6s / Plus and later - 4K Max - 4032x2268 - in-app purchase - iPhone 6s / Plus and later - High frame rate: * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 720p - all devices * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 1080p - all devices * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K - iPhone 5 / iPad Air 2 and later * 48 / 50 / 60 fps 4K Max - iPhone 6s / Plus and later MANUAL CONTROLS - Manual exposure, shutter speed, ISO, focus, and white balance controls - Scroll and steppers system inspired by DSLR cameras - Tap location accurate manual focus assist - True focus peaking - Zebra stripes - overexposure warning - Live shutter speed, ISO, focus, and WB values - Manual controls are supported in all photo and video modes MAIN CAMERA FEATURES - RAW (DNG) iOS 10 - iPhone 6s / iPad Pro 9.7 and later - Lossless TIFF file format support - Intelligent 3-shot HDR - AEB (Auto Exposure Bracketing) with RAW support for high contrast conditions - Live light level histogram - Adjustable aspect ratio (4:3 / 3:2 / 16:9 / 1:1) - Video pause/resume functionality - Video audio meter (Avg. / Peak signal levels) - Still photo capture during video recording - Realtime video stabilization (ON/OFF) - Video disk space indicator - Thirds grid and horizontal tiltmeter. - Date / time / location / Copyright stamp PHOTO / VIDEO EDITOR & PHOTO EDITING EXTENSION - Nondestructive editing - all edits, including cropping, are completely amendable / reversible - 60 expertly crafted filters - 17 lenses: Vignette / White Vignette / Fisheye / Tilt Shift / Macro / Tiny Planet / Wormhole / Split / Kaleidoscope I, II, III, IV, V / Ripple / Striped / Hatched / Halftone - 19 comprehensive adjustment tools - Trimming, cropping, rotating, mirroring, straightening, and perspective correction - Extremely accurate timeline with the ability to review videos frame by frame - Ability to add background music
